name: Depression In The Classroom
description:
Depression in the Classroom: Understanding Where Students Are is an educational simulation for understanding the effects of depression in the daily lives of students. 

WARNING: depression, anxiety, panic attacks

For more information: Depression: Factsheet for Educators

____________________________________________________________________________________________
